config.siddhiApp: @App:name('APIMTopApiCreatorsSiddhi') @primaryKey('API_ID') @store(type="rdbms" , datasource="AM_DB") define table AM_API(API_ID int,API_PROVIDER string,API_NAME string,API_VERSION string,CONTEXT string,CONTEXT_TEMPLATE string,API_TIER string,CREATED_BY string,CREATED_TIME string,UPDATED_BY string,UPDATED_TIME string);

queryData.query: from AM_API select CREATED_BY,count(API_ID) AS count group by CREATED_BY order by count desc limit {{limit}};
